content: Create HTML element with id from config and insert it inside document body for place SDK frame:

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the action of creating an HTML element and inserting it into the document body. It appears in a UI component, likely a button or dialog prompt, that guides users through a step-by-step process for placing a Software Development Kit (SDK) frame.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation includes quotation marks around "HTML" and "SDK". While technically not incorrect, they are not present in the English source and deviate from standard practice in technical documentation. Consider removing them for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أنشئوا عنصر HTML باستخدام المعرّف من الإعدادات وأدرجوه في جسم المستند لوضع إطار SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "أنشئوا" (ansh'u) implies a command directed towards a plural 'you'. The original English doesn't specify a plural audience. It would be more accurate to use the singular or general form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أنشئ عنصر HTML باستخدام المعرّف من الإعدادات وأدرجوه في جسم المستند لوضع إطار SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Konfiqurasiyadan id-dən istifadə edərək' is a bit awkward. It directly translates 'from config with id' which isn't the most natural way to express that in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Konfiqurasiyaya uyğun olaraq id-yə əsasən'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfiqurasiyaya uyğun olaraq id-yə əsasən

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'onu sənədin daxilinə əlavə edin:' is a literal translation of 'insert it inside document'. A better phrasing would be 'onu sənəd cismini daxilinə yerləşdirin:'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: onu sənəd cismini daxilinə yerləşdirin:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "for place SDK frame" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning. A more natural translation would be something like "за поставяне на SDK рамката" or "за да се постави SDK рамката".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: за поставяне на SDK рамката

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Dokumenttext' (document text) is incorrect and misleading. It should refer to the document body.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Erstellen Sie ein HTML-Element mit der ID aus der Konfiguration und fügen Sie es in den Dokumentkörper ein, um den SDK-Rahmen zu platzieren:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the imperative mood ('Erstellen Sie...') might sound abrupt in certain contexts. Consider a slightly more passive phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Erstellen Sie ein HTML-Element mit der ID aus der Konfiguration und fügen Sie es in den Dokumentkörper ein, um den SDK-Rahmen zu platzieren:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "για την τοποθέτηση πλαισίου SDK" is a somewhat literal translation of "for place SDK frame". A more natural Greek phrasing would be "για την τοποθέτηση του πλαισίου SDK" or "ώστε να τοποθετηθεί το πλαίσιο SDK".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: για την τοποθέτηση του πλαισίου SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation uses the infinitive 'insertarlo' which is grammatically incorrect following 'cree'. It needs to be conjugated to match the tense of 'cree'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cree un elemento HTML con id a partir de la configuración y insértelo dentro del cuerpo del documento para colocar el marco SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation uses 'y' instead of a period to connect the two clauses. While not strictly incorrect, it sounds slightly less formal than a period would be appropriate for technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cree un elemento HTML con id a partir de la configuración. Insértelo dentro del cuerpo del documento para colocar el marco SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "asiakirjan runkoon" (document body) is not the most natural way to describe inserting into the body. While technically correct, a more common and fluent phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Luo HTML-elementti tunnuksella konfiguraatiosta ja liitä se suoraan dokumentin runkoon / dokumentin päärunkoon / sivun runkoon SDK-kehyksen paikalle:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence feels somewhat abrupt and unnatural in Finnish.  While not strictly wrong, it would read better without it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Luo HTML-elementti tunnuksella konfiguraatiosta ja liitä se suoraan dokumentin runkoon / dokumentin päärunkoon / sivun runkoon SDK-kehyksen paikalle

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pour placer le cadre SDK :" is a literal translation and sounds awkward in French. A more natural phrasing would be "pour y insérer le cadre SDK".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: pour y insérer le cadre SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a hyphenated word "շրջանակի-համար" which is not grammatically correct in Armenian. It should be separated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ստեղծել HTML տարր՝ config-ից ստացված id-ով և տեղադրել այն document.body-ում SDK շրջանակի համար։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'per posizionare il frame SDK' is grammatically correct but could be more natural. A more common phrasing would use 'per l'inserimento del frame SDK' or 'per l'impostazione del frame SDK'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: per l'inserimento del frame SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "SDKフレームを配置:" is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Japanese. It implies physically placing the frame, which isn't the intended meaning. The English 'place SDK frame' refers to inserting it into the DOM.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDKフレームを挿入する (SDK frame to insert) or SDKフレームを配置する場所 (location to place SDK frame)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence is not standard in Japanese. While colons are used, they'd be more common after explanations rather than as sentence endings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon or replace it with a more natural sentence-ending marker like か (ka) if it's a question, or simply end with a full stop (。) .

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "for place SDK frame" is not accurately translated. "배치하기 위해" implies a general placement rather than specifically placing an SDK frame.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK 프레임을 넣기 위해

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit awkward. Combining the two verbs '생성하고' and '삽입하세요' feels unnatural in Korean.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 구성에서 ID를 사용하여 HTML 요소를 생성하고 문서 본문에 삽입하여 SDK 프레임을 배치하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ອງກ໌ການ HTML" is not a standard or accurate translation of "HTML element." It's a very literal and awkward translation. It should be something more natural like "ອົງປະກອບ HTML" or simply "ເອີ້ນຫາກໍານົດວ່າເອີ້ນວ່າ HTML".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອົງປະກອບ HTML

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ໃສ່ມັນເຂົ້າໄປໃນຕົວເນື້ອຂອງເອກະສານ" is a very literal and somewhat cumbersome translation of "insert it inside document body."  It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃສ່ລົງໃນຕົວເອກະສານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "ວາງ" is a bit ambiguous. In the context of inserting a frame, a more accurate translation would be something closer to "ຕັ້ງ" or "ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕັ້ງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'insert it inside document body' is not accurately translated. 'documenttekst' translates to 'document text' and doesn't convey the intended meaning of inserting into the body of the HTML document. The phrase 'voeg het in de documenttekst in' is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: voeg het toe aan de body van het document

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is somewhat awkward in Dutch. While grammatically correct, it's not as fluid as it could be.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maak een HTML-element aan met een id uit de configuratie en voeg dit toe aan de body van het document om het SDK-kader te plaatsen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "for place SDK frame" is not accurately translated. "jako kontener dla ramki SDK" implies 'as a container for the SDK frame', which is correct but slightly changes the intended meaning. A more direct translation would be 'dla umieszczenia ramki SDK' or 'aby umieścić ramkę SDK'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby umieścić ramkę SDK.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'SDK frame' is better translated as 'estrutura do SDK' or 'quadro do SDK' rather than 'moldura do SDK'. 'Moldura' typically refers to a picture frame.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crie um elemento HTML com o id da configuração e insira-o no corpo do documento para colocar a estrutura do SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "quadro do SDK" is unnecessary and breaks the flow. It's more natural to omit it in Brazilian Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crie um elemento HTML com o id da configuração e insira-o dentro do corpo do documento para colocar o quadro do SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian sentence structure is slightly awkward. 'Creați elementul HTML cu id-ul din configurarea' could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creați un element HTML cu ID-ul din configurare

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The preposition 'pentru a' is redundant. It's more concise to simply state the purpose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creați un element HTML cu ID-ul din configurare și introduceți-l în corpul documentului pentru plasarea cadrului SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "SDK frame" is unnecessary and breaks the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Создайте HTML-элемент с идентификатором из конфигурации и вставьте его в тело документа для размещения фрейма SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'SDK රාමුව තැබීම සඳහා' (for placing the SDK frame) is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'SDK රාමුව ස්ථාපනය කිරීම සඳහා' (for installing the SDK frame) or 'SDK රාමුව දැමීම සඳහා' (for placing the SDK frame).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK රාමුව ස්ථාපනය කිරීම සඳහා

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the Sinhala sentence is not standard in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon at the end of the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "for place SDK frame" is not accurately translated. 'ako miesto pre SDK rámec' implies 'as a place for the SDK frame', while the English suggests a purpose or location for the frame.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vytvorte prvok HTML s id získaným z konfiguračného objektu a vložte ho do tela dokumentu na umiestnenie SDK rámca.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using a more natural-sounding phrase would improve readability. The current phrasing, while literal, is slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to a more idiomatic expression. Alternatives depend on the exact nuance desired (e.g., 'na umiestnenie SDK rámca' or 'pre SDK rámec').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'za okvir SDK:' is grammatically a bit awkward. It implies 'for the SDK frame' but is not the most natural way to express this in Slovenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustvarite element HTML z ID-jem iz konfiguracije in ga vstavite v telo dokumenta za umestitev okvirja SDK:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "оквир" is a valid word, but in this context, "рам" (ram) or perhaps "рамски елемент" (frame element) might be more precise, depending on the intended meaning.  "Оквир" often implies a more decorative frame.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "оквир" with "рам" or "рамски елемент" for greater accuracy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "postavio SDK okvir" is not the best translation for "place SDK frame". It implies positioning or arranging, rather than simply inserting. A more accurate translation would convey the action of inserting the frame.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kreiraj HTML element sa ID-jem iz konfiguracije i ubaci ga u telo dokumenta za postavljanje SDK okvira.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically not incorrect, "sa ID-jem" is a less natural phrasing in Serbian. 'sa ID-om' would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kreiraj HTML element sa ID-om iz konfiguracije i ubaci ga u telo dokumenta kako bi se postavio SDK okvir:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Create HTML element with id from config" is not accurately translated. 'From config' implies extracting the id from a configuration. The Turkish translation 'Config içindeki kimliğe sahip bir HTML öğesi' literally translates to 'An HTML element with an identity inside the config', which is slightly awkward. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of obtaining or extracting the id from the configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Config'den kimliği alarak bir HTML öğesi oluşturun

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'belge gövdesine ekleyin' (add to document body) is grammatically correct but a bit formal for a technical context. A more conversational or technically appropriate phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: belge gövdesine yerleştirin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'để đặt khung SDK:' is a literal translation of 'to place SDK frame'. A more natural and accurate translation would be something like 'để chứa khung SDK' (to contain the SDK frame) or 'để hiển thị khung SDK' (to display the SDK frame).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: để chứa khung SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '从配置中创建具有 id 的 HTML 元素，并将其插入文档正文中以放置 SDK 框架：' doesn't fully convey the original meaning. The English phrase 'Create HTML element with id from config' implies creating the element *using* the configuration. The current translation reads as 'create an element with an ID from the config', which is slightly different.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 从配置读取信息，创建具有 id 的 HTML 元素，并将其插入文档正文中以放置 SDK 框架：

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence is a bit abrupt and might benefit from a slightly more natural flow in Chinese. While not strictly incorrect, it can feel a little stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 从配置读取信息，创建具有 id 的 HTML 元素，并将其插入文档正文中放置 SDK 框架。
